page.title: 05ATTITUDES
page.content: 100 years from now,new things like tiny crystals for storage of computer data and electronic circuitry may be in use.We think the world may be automated and computerised.Houses will be electronically controlled.People may eat tablets to provide them with the necessary nutrients.Bio-chemical systems may control heating.Laser operated hologram systems will replace television which uses electron beams to produce moving pictures.Houses may be built of sheet aluminum,instead of bricks and mortar.
